name: find_largest_prime_factor
description: Create a Scratch program that takes a positive integer greater than 1 as input and outputs its largest prime factor. The sprite should say the result.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that takes a positive integer greater than 1 as input and outputs its largest prime factor. The sprite should say the result.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: find_largest_prime_factor
